name: Embedded QR
description: A video link is given (bit-plane ans in transcript), QR code inside the img on scanning gives answer

questions.title: Embedded QR
questions.description: Check this video out, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2NbxOAcrvs8 , maybe play it in a language you'd understand? https://tinyurl.com/embedded-img
questions.hint: Use StegOnline after checking the video's transcript/subtitles
